sentence.Network_en: Hung - chien unenthusiastically invited Miss Sun out for dinner.
sentence.Network_cn: 鸿渐请孙小姐去吃晚饭,可是并不热心.

sentence.Network_en: He received my suggestion coolly, ie unenthusiastically.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对待我的建议十分冷淡.

sentence.Network_en: The children opened the presents unenthusiastically.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子们毫无热情地打开了礼物.
